summary: Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.
cast: Maggie Gyllenhaal|Oscar Steer|Asa Butterfield|Lil Woods|Eros Vlahos|Rosie Taylor-Ritson|Daniel Mays|Rhys Ifans|Maggie Smith|Sinead Matthews|Katy Brand|Emma Thompson|Bill Bailey|Ewan McGregor|Sam Kelly|Nonso Anozie|Ralph Fiennes|Ed Stoppard|Toby Sedgwick|Lauren Barrand|Julie Eagleton|Robert Ireland|Nathan Robinson|Gillian Steventon
title: La niñera mágica y el Big Bang
